properties.description: Our cafe is a warm space for people who need company and people to chat to. Our Sunday morning Christian Worship service is for anyone interested in learning more about or worshiping God. You are welcome to join us for our Company Cafe on Wednesday mornings from 10 am to 12pm. for Hot drinks and snacks and company. You will get a warm welcome at our Sunday Morning Christian Worship service with tea and coffee served after.

properties.description: Open from Thursday 19th January . Morning sessions Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday are for babies,toddlers and parents, the focus on Wednesday afternoons is older people. Thursday soup lunches alternate weeks from 19th January 11:30-14:00 are for everyone. Tuesday mornings are for toddlers and parents and carers only. Monday and Wednesday mornings are parents/ grandparents and toddlers only. Wednesday afternoons we offer tea or coffee and cake with jig saw puzzles and board games to all comers.
